alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 21 at 10:57PM CDT until March 22 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of the Panhandle of Oklahoma. portions of the Panhandle of Texas. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. In Oklahoma, call 844-465-4997 for road information. In Texas, call 800-452-9292 for road information.
